text: The 2015 St Helens Metropolitan Borough Council election took take place on 7 May 2015 to elect members of St Helens Metropolitan Borough Council in England. This was on the same day as other local elections. ==References== Category:2015 English local elections Category:May 2015 events in the United Kingdom 2015 Category:2010s in Merseyside
title: 2015 St Helens Metropolitan Borough Council election
